title: FastVLM Output Schema
description: Schema for validating output from FastVLM model predictions

description.description: The descriptive text generated by the model about the image

tags.description: Tags or keywords associated with the image content

metadata.description: Additional metadata about the model and prediction

model.description: Name of the model used for the prediction

model_version.description: Version of the model used for the prediction

prompt.description: The prompt used for the prediction, if any
